widgets.title: Avg HTTP Response vs. Error Logs & Spans

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
| filter pay_transaction.amount > '0.0' 
| groupby $m.timestamp / 5m as time, pay_transaction.currency as currency aggregate count() as trans_count

source logs
| filter pay_transaction.amount != null
| groupby pay_transaction.currency as currency, pay_transaction.cc as card_type aggregate round(sum(pay_transaction.amount:num),2) as totalAmount
| orderby totalAmount desc

widgets.title: Server Errors by HTTP Requests Info

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs
| filter $l.subsystemname == 'frontend' 
| convert $d.json.http_resp_status:number
| filter $d.json.http_resp_status >= 500
| groupby $d.json.http_req_path as request_path, json.http_req_ip_geoip.country_name as country_name, $d.json.http_req_ip_geoip.city_name as city_name, $d.json.http_req_method as request_method aggregate count() as occurrence
| filter $d.city_name != null
| orderby occurrence desc

widgets.title: Checkly Synthetics - Frontend Avg API Checks (seconds)

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs
| filter $l.applicationname == 'default' && $l.subsystemname == 'frontend'
| groupby $d.product_id_enriched.category as $d.product_category agg sum($d.product_id_enriched.price_in_currency:num) as $d.total_price
| filter $d.product_category != null

source logs
| filter $l.applicationname == 'default' && $l.subsystemname == 'frontend'
| groupby $d.product_id_enriched.category as $d.product_category agg sum($d.product_id_enriched.price_in_currency:num) as $d.total_price
| filter $d.product_category != null
